search complet team history, see histori tampa bay buccan raymond jame stadium buccan play home game sinc 1998 articl compil list season complet tampa bay buccaneers, american footbal franchis base tampa, florida. buccan member south divis nation footbal confer (nfc) nation footbal leagu (nfl). list document season-by-season record tampa bay buccaneers' franchis 1976 present, includ postseason records, leagu award individu player head coaches. buccan first join nfl 1976 member afc west. follow year, move nfc central. tampa bay expans franchis origin award tom mccloskey, construct compani owner philadelphia. soon becam appar mccloskey financi problems, nfl found replac hugh culverhouse. purchas malcolm glazer 1995 $192 million, follow culverhouse' death. front offic staff team includ bryan glazer, edward glazer, joel glazer. buccan one super bowl championship: 2002. teams' super bowl appearance, reach nfc confer championship two occasions. buccan division champion six times, three nfc central three nfc south. first team win nfc south nfl restructur 2002. 40-year history, buccan play 500 regular post-season game appear post-season ten times. content 1 season 2 footnot 3 refer 4 extern link seasons[edit] finish, wins, losses, tie column list regular season result exclud postseason play. regular postseason record combin bottom list. super bowl champion (1970–present) confer champion divis champion wild card berth nfl season team season leagu confer divis regular season post season result award head coach finish win loss tie 1976 1976 nfl afc west 5th 0 14 0 john mckay 1977 1977 nfl nfc central 5th 2 12 0 john mckay 1978[1] 1978 nfl nfc central 5th 5 11 0 john mckay 1979[2] 1979 nfl nfc central 1st 10 6 0 division playoff (eagles) 24–17 lost confer championship (rams) 0–9 lee roy selmon (dpoy) john mckay 1980 1980 nfl nfc central 4th 5 10 1 john mckay 1981 1981 nfl nfc central 1st 9 7 0 lost division playoff (at cowboys) 0–38 john mckay 1982[3] 1982 nfl nfc — 7th 5 4 0 lost first round (at cowboys) 17–30 john mckay 1983 1983 nfl nfc central 5th 2 14 0 john mckay 1984 1984 nfl nfc central 3rd 6 10 0 john mckay 1985 1985 nfl nfc central 5th 2 14 0 leeman bennett 1986 1986 nfl nfc central 5th 2 14 0 leeman bennett 1987 1987 nfl nfc central 4th 4 11 0 ray perkin 1988 1988 nfl nfc central 3rd 5 11 0 ray perkin 1989 1989 nfl nfc central 5th 5 11 0 ray perkin 1990 1990 nfl nfc central 2nd 6 10 0 ray perkin (5–8) richard williamson (1–2) 1991 1991 nfl nfc central 5th 3 13 0 richard williamson 1992 1992 nfl nfc central 3rd 5 11 0 sam wych 1993 1993 nfl nfc central 5th 5 11 0 sam wych 1994 1994 nfl nfc central 5th 6 10 0 sam wych 1995 1995 nfl nfc central 5th 7 9 0 sam wych 1996 1996 nfl nfc central 4th 6 10 0 toni dungi 1997 1997 nfl nfc central 2nd 10 6 0 wild card playoff (lions) 20–10 lost division playoff (at packers) 7–21 warrick dunn (oroy) toni dungi 1998 1998 nfl nfc central 3rd 8 8 0 toni dungi 1999 1999 nfl nfc central 1st 11 5 0 division playoff (redskins) 14–13 lost confer championship (at rams) 6–11 warren sapp (dpoy) toni dungi 2000 2000 nfl nfc central 2nd 10 6 0 lost wild card playoff (at eagles) 3–21 derrick brook (wpmoy) toni dungi 2001 2001 nfl nfc central 3rd 9 7 0 lost wild card playoff (at eagles) 9–31 toni dungi 2002 2002 nfl nfc south 1st[4][5] 12 4 0 division playoff (49ers) 31–6 confer championship (at eagles) 27–10 super bowl xxxvii (1) (vs. raiders) 48–21 derrick brook (dpoy) dexter jackson (sb mvp) jon gruden 2003 2003 nfl nfc south 3rd 7 9 0 jon gruden 2004 2004 nfl nfc south 4th 5 11 0 jon gruden 2005 2005 nfl nfc south 1st[6][7] 11 5 0 lost wild card playoff (redskins) 10–17 carnel william (oroy) jon gruden 2006 2006 nfl nfc south 4th 4 12 0 jon gruden 2007 2007 nfl nfc south 1st 9 7 0 lost wild card playoff (giants) 14–24 jon gruden 2008 2008 nfl nfc south 3rd 9 7 0 jon gruden 2009 2009 nfl nfc south 4th 3 13 0 raheem morri 2010 2010 nfl nfc south 3rd 10 6 0 raheem morri 2011 2011 footnotes[edit] ^ 1978 season, nfl expand 14-game season 16-game season. ^ buccan finish ahead chicago bear nfc central base better divis record 6–2 bear 5–3 ^ 1982 strike-shorten season leagu divid two confer instead normal division alignment. ^ philadelphia eagl clinch nfc number 1 seed ahead buccan base better confer record 11–1 buccaneers' 9–3. ^ buccan clinch nfc number 2 seed ahead green bay packer base better head-to-head record. ^ buccan finish ahead carolina panther nfc south better division record 5–1 panther 4–2. ^ chicago bear clinch nfc number 2 seed ahead buccan base better
